emails.subject: Update reference subtypes for type location: PORT, PORT_TERMINAL, PORT_BERTH
emails.cc: Louis Olive; Mohamed Elasfoury; LÃ©onard Berney; Nicolas Chaperon
emails.body_text:
Please open a ticket containing the following instructions:

1.	Rename PORT_TERMINAL to PORT
2.	Create 2 new subtypes: PORT_TERMINAL and PORT_BERTH
3.	Naming convention for type PORT is PORT_XXXX (not changing)
4.	Naming convention for type PORT_TERMINAL is TERMINAL_<port_code>_<terminal_code>
5.	Naming convention for type PORT_BERTH is BERTH_<port_code>_<berth_name>
6.	Make sure each location of type PORT_TERMINAL has the PORT as the parent
7.	Make sure each location of type PORT_BERTH has the TERMINAL as the parent

Kind regards
Iulian Gramatki
emails.body_html:
Please open a ticket containing the following instructions:
  1. Rename PORT_TERMINAL to PORT
  2. Create 2 new subtypes: PORT_TERMINAL and PORT_BERTH
  3. Naming convention for type PORT is PORT_XXXX (not changing)
  4. Naming convention for type PORT_TERMINAL is TERMINAL_<port_code>_<terminal_code>
  5. Naming convention for type PORT_BERTH is BERTH_<port_code>_<berth_name>
  6. Make sure each location of type PORT_TERMINAL has the PORT as the parent
  7. Make sure each location of type PORT_BERTH has the TERMINAL as the parent
Kind regards
Iulian Gramatki

subject: Update reference subtypes for type location: PORT, PORT_TERMINAL, PORT_BERTH
